text.content:
Earth Rumble

Normal damage. Crit Effect: The target and each enemy adjacent to it must succeed at a @Check[type:reflex] of fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Prone]{Prone}.

Bludgeoning

Vulnerable Spot

The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} until healed.

Piercing

Shield Cleave

Deal normal damage to the target's shield (apply Hardness normally).

Slashing

Wild Surge

Normal damage and then normal damage again of a random energy type (roll [[/r 1d4#1-acid; 2-cold; 3-fire; 4-electricity]]{1d4; 1-acid; 2-cold; 3-fire; 4-electricity}).

Bomb or Spell
